name: Starling
headline: AI enabling digital urine diagnostics in the home
description: Starling is building a urine diagnostic remote patient monitoring platform that seamlessly integrates into anyone's bathroom routine.  By detecting early changes in a patient's urine using our toilet indwelling mass spectroscopy device, our platform is aiming to prevent hospitalizations from numerous conditions like recurrent UTIs, BPH exacerbations, or diabetes. We do this while creating significant new annual revenues for our clinician partners from remote patient monitoring reimbursements without requiring any significant changes in a staff's day to day schedule.

founders.name: Drew Hendricks, Founder
founders.description: I am a health-tech entrepreneur with a special interest in all things urine and diagnostic. My background in medicine and medical device design gives me a unique point of view while identifying major gaps in healthcare through regular patient interaction.

founders.name: Hannah McKenney, Founder
founders.description: My experience within both the hospital and industry setting has developed my interest in emphasising the user-centered and human factors design of medical technologies to ensure accessibility and usability in all areas around the world. My skills are broadly in problem definition, upstream product development, and implementation of medical technologies (device and digital health) in the clinical setting. I am focused on ensuring Starling prioritises the user experience throughout our growth.

[ Request More Info ](https://starlingmedical.com/</contact-us/>)
#  Daily at-home monitoring 
At Starling Medical, we equip users with the tools and real-time insights needed to maintain healthy habits and access to care options.
[ Request More Info ](https://starlingmedical.com/</contact-us/>)
#####  WE ARE STARLING MEDICAL 
##  Our technology is designed to empower users to take control of their health 
[ Learn more about our technology ](https://starlingmedical.com/</technology/>)
### Meet UrinDx™
A medical device capable of monitoring aspects of your health every time you go to the bathroom
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/UrinDx-light-blue-blob-no-shadow.png)
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/icon-homecare.png)
#####  Seamless care from the comfortof your home 
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/icon-analytics.png)
#####  Dedicated Starling care team and health algorithms enabling early intervention 
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/icon-doctor.png)
#####  Partnered with providersto connect patients to clinical care 
###  No Upfront Costs 
Starling Medical's program is reimbursed by insurance. Most patients pay $0 for UrinDx.* 
*Individual pricing may vary depending on insurance coverage 
[ Request More Info ](https://starlingmedical.com/</contact-us/>)
#####  FOR HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS 
##  Provide better preventative care without impacting your bottom line 
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/patient-dr-blob-home-2.png)
### **Urology & Primary Care**
Starling’s innovative program highlights patients' urinary health patterns and trends.
[ Learn more ](https://starlingmedical.com/</for-providers/>)
##### **Patient-Driven Monitoring**
UrinDx real-time insights can motivate behavioral changes to lower the risk of rUTIs.
##### **Dedicated Care Team**
Starling supports daily rUTI patient exchanges, allowing you to focus on high-revenue and surgical cases.
##### **Triage Reimbursement**
Get reimbursed for providing preventative care and reduce repeat clinic visits.
AUA definition of rUTI: While there have been multiple definitions for a recurrent urinary tract infection (rUTI) in the past, the most recent guideline published and confirmed by the American Urological Association (AUA) in 2022 endorses the definition of a rUTI to be: “Two separate culture-proven episodes of acute bacterial cystitis and associated symptoms within six months or three episodes within one year” (AUA rUTI Guideline 2022).
#####  THE STARLING PREVENTATIVE HEALTH APPROACH 
##  Proactive care with our nurse-monitored dashboard and user-facing smartphone app 
### **Promoting good antibiotic stewardship**
With personal health insights delivered right to a patient's smartphone, they will have all the information needed to make healthier habits become second nature.
[ Learn more ](https://starlingmedical.com/</technology/>)
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/patients-blob-home-3.png)
[![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Daily-habits-to-prevent-utis.jpg)](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/simple-daily-habits-to-prevent-utis-and-why-they-actually-work/>)
[ Simple Daily Habits to Prevent UTIs ](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/simple-daily-habits-to-prevent-utis-and-why-they-actually-work/>)
[![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/UTI-symptoms.jpg)](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/recognize-uti-symptoms-early/>)
[ Recognize UTI Symptoms Early ](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/recognize-uti-symptoms-early/>)
[![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/stay-hydrated.jpg)](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/hydration-is-a-powerful-tool-for-uti-prevention/>)
[ Hydration is a Powerful Tool for UTI Prevention ](https://starlingmedical.com/</2024/12/09/hydration-is-a-powerful-tool-for-uti-prevention/>)
###  General FAQs 
###  What is UrinDx™️?
**UrinDx** _(ur-in-dex)_ is an at-home urine monitoring device that becomes a part of anyone’s bathroom routine. UrinDx sends your urinary health information every night to Starling's care team. If clinical concern exists, the team will reach out with next steps to schedule an appointment to understand the recent changes.
You can track your health insights, symptoms, upcoming telehealth appointments in the Starling App. All in one place!
###  What is UrinDx™️ looking for?
A urinary tract infection (UTI) can be caused by different types of bacteria. Many of these bacteria change a normal chemical in your urine, called nitrates, into another chemical called **nitrites**. As a result, if you have nitrites in your urine, it usually means that you have a UTI. 
In short, UrinDx is looking for signs of nitrites!
###  What do I need to use UrinDx™️?
UrinDx is easily installed in the privacy of your home’s bathroom. **You will need a smartphone with access to the internet and bluetooth capability.**
Included in your shipment box will be the device, anchor(s), and a user manual.
###  Do I need special equipment to install UrinDx™️?
**No special equipment needed!** You will first download the Starling Medical app. This is how you will receive feedback from your urine samples and contact your Starling Care Team, if necessary.
Once UrinDx arrives at your home address, you will pick a toilet you most commonly use first thing in the morning, clean the toilet, and remove the plastic backing from the device anchor. UrinDx gently snaps in place and will be ready for use.
###  Who will see my data?
We understand health data is private. Starling Medical only allows you and your clinical team to access your data.
![](https://starlingmedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/pete-astro-1.png)
##  Our goal is to prevent hospitalizations with every flush.

generated_description:
**Starling Medical: Revolutionizing Home Health Monitoring**

Founded in 2019 and nurtured through Y Combinator's W22 batch, Starling Medical is located in Houston, TX, and is making waves in the healthcare space with its innovative urine diagnostics technology. The mission? To leverage AI and a unique diagnostic platform to enable at-home monitoring of urine health, all while fitting seamlessly into daily bathroom routines.

At the heart of Starling’s offering is **UrinDx™**, a sophisticated device that uses mass spectroscopy to monitor patient health every time they visit the restroom. This device is specifically designed to identify early changes in urinary health, aiming to prevent hospitalizations due to conditions such as recurrent urinary tract infections (rUTIs), benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), and diabetes-related issues. 

**How It Works:**
The UrinDx device pairs with a smartphone app to deliver real-time urinary health insights directly to users and their healthcare providers. When it detects concerning changes—like the presence of nitrites that could indicate a UTI—Starling's care team is alerted to reach out, allowing for timely interventions and reducing the need for unnecessary clinic visits.

Starling isn’t just about the tech; it’s also about creating a sustainable model for healthcare providers. By integrating this remote patient monitoring platform, clinicians can diversify their revenue streams through insurance reimbursements without adding to their workload. This makes it a win-win: patients benefit from proactive health monitoring at home, and providers can enhance their care offerings without disrupting their routines.

**The Bigger Picture:**
Starling Medical operates under the understanding that effective healthcare shouldn’t have to come at the cost of convenience or privacy. They prioritize patient data security—ensuring that only the user and their medical teams have access to personal health information, which is crucial in today’s digital age.

With a lean team of five, Starling is ambitious but has the foundational support of strategic partners. The company is poised for growth, not just in Texas but potentially across the nation, as they look to optimize home health diagnostics and pave the way for smarter, more accessible healthcare solutions.

In summary, Starling Medical stands at the intersection of technology and healthcare, harnessing the potential of AI and everyday home life to keep health monitoring simple, effective, and private. Their goal? To prevent hospitalizations with every flush—now that’s a mission worth supporting.

For more information, check out their website: [Starling Medical](https://starlingmedical.com/).
